description: Creates a state template. State templates contain state properties, which are signals that belong to a signal catalog that is synchronized between the Amazon Web Services IoT FleetWise Edge and the Amazon Web Services Cloud.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the state template.

parameters.name: signalCatalogArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the signal catalog associated with the state template.

parameters.name: stateTemplateProperties
parameters.description: A list of signals from which data is collected. The state template properties contain the fully qualified names of the signals. (string) ---

parameters.name: dataExtraDimensions
parameters.description: A list of vehicle attributes to associate with the payload published on the state template's MQTT topic. (See Processing last known state vehicle data using MQTT messaging). For example, if you add Vehicle.Attributes.Make and Vehicle.Attributes.Model attributes, Amazon Web Services IoT FleetWise will enrich the protobuf encoded payload with those attributes in the extraDimensions field. (string) ---

parameters.name: metadataExtraDimensions
parameters.description: A list of vehicle attributes to associate with user properties of the messages published on the state template's MQTT topic. (See Processing last known state vehicle data using MQTT messaging). For example, if you add Vehicle.Attributes.Make and Vehicle.Attributes.Model attributes, Amazon Web Services IoT FleetWise will include these attributes as User Properties with the MQTT message. Default: An empty array (string) ---

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Metadata that can be used to manage the state template. (dict) --- A set of key/value pairs that are used to manage the resource. The tag's key. The tag's value.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the state template.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the state template.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the state template.
